caption:
Meaning resides in every little detail.

This one-of-a-kind station necklace was created to honor our client's mother. Using her mother's wedding band, the InBloom Jewelry team crafted a truly beautiful piece in her memory.

An emerald—our client's birthstone—symbolizes the unbreakable bond between mother and daughter. Yellow gold leaves, hand-cast in wax by the InBloom Jewelry goldsmiths, complete this bespoke necklace. Every element was thoughtfully chosen to create a timeless tribute to their unique connection.

inbloomjewelry.com 💚 301-835-7929
